name: Dis Pontibus
description: A single-player game set in a archipelago full of puzzles.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 SP1+ Processor: 1.8GHz CPU: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities. Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 7 SP1+ Processor: 1.8GHz CPU: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities. Storage: 100 MB available space
